entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC

[info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv, dqc_0011.csv, dqc_0079.csv, dqc_0080.csv, dqc_0081.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2018_concepts.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2019_concepts.csv, dqc_0094.csv and effective_dates.csv successful. - C:\Users\David\AppData\Local\Temp\tmprvmbg2ao\packages\resources.zip

[DQC.US.0070.7645] The concept DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets with a defaulted value of 567,000,000 is not equal to the aggregated value of the dimensionally qualified components on the axis DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis which has an aggregate value of 514,000,000 based on the data in the filing. The aggregated value is calculated by adding the members in the network 2414403 - Disclosure - Postretirement Benefit Plans (Summary of Plan Assets, Benefit Obligation and Funded Status) (Details) with the uri http://www.xyleminc.com/role/PostretirementBenefitPlansSummaryOfPlanAssetsBenefitObligationAndFundedStatusDetails. The values of the calculation components are as follows: HedgeFundsMember --> 67,000,000 --> us-gaap:FairValueByMeasurementBasisAxis=us-gaap:EstimateOfFairValueFairValueDisclosureMember, us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:HedgeFundsMember DerivativeMember --> 27,000,000 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:DerivativeMember, us-gaap:FairValueByMeasurementBasisAxis=us-gaap:EstimateOfFairValueFairValueDisclosureMember InsuranceContractsAndOtherMember --> 186,000,000 --> us-gaap:FairValueByMeasurementBasisAxis=us-gaap:EstimateOfFairValueFairValueDisclosureMember, us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=xyl:InsuranceContractsAndOtherMember USGovernmentAgenciesDebtSecuritiesMember --> 51,000,000 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:USGovernmentAgenciesDebtSecuritiesMember, us-gaap:FairValueByMeasurementBasisAxis=us-gaap:EstimateOfFairValueFairValueDisclosureMember CorporateDebtSecuritiesMember --> 59,000,000 --> us-gaap:FairValueByMeasurementBasisAxis=us-gaap:EstimateOfFairValueFairValueDisclosureMember, us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:CorporateDebtSecuritiesMember ExchangeTradedFundsMember --> 1,000,000 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:ExchangeTradedFundsMember, us-gaap:FairValueByMeasurementBasisAxis=us-gaap:EstimateOfFairValueFairValueDisclosureMember PrivateEquityFundsMember --> 6,000,000 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:PrivateEquityFundsMember, us-gaap:FairValueByMeasurementBasisAxis=us-gaap:EstimateOfFairValueFairValueDisclosureMember GlobalStockFundsAndSecuritiesMember --> 117,000,000 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=xyl:GlobalStockFundsAndSecuritiesMember, us-gaap:FairValueByMeasurementBasisAxis=us-gaap:EstimateOfFairValueFairValueDisclosureMember
The value of a concept broken down by its components along the DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis axis should be equal to its component pieces. An error could occur for one of the following reasons:
1. The values of the plan assets by category have been further disaggregated by additional dimensions such as geography. Plan Asset categories should not be dimensionally disaggregated and members should be defined for each security class reported. i.e. Equity Securities in the US should be represented as a single member.
2. The default value of 567,000,000 is incorrectly totaled for DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets
3. Not all dimension members or additional dimensions have been defined on the category axis DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis.
4. The filer has reported a sub component of plan assets that does not represent a complete breakdown of the total. In these cases the element DefinedBenefitPlanPlanAssetsInvestmentWithinPlanAssetCategoryAmount should be used instead of the element DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets.
This rule aggregates the value of member components located on the axis at the highest level of aggregation to avoid double counting in the event that the company uses a hierarchy of members.
The properties of this us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets fact are: Period :2018-12-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:FairValueByMeasurementBasisAxis=us-gaap:EstimateOfFairValueFairValueDisclosureMember Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:7645 Rule version: 13.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1524472/000152447220000006/xyl1231201910kv1.htm 6707

property.name: label

entry.message:
[DQC.US.0070.7645] The concept DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets with a defaulted value of 567,000,000 is not equal to the aggregated value of the dimensionally qualified components on the axis DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis which has an aggregate value of 508,000,000 based on the data in the filing. The aggregated value is calculated by adding the members in the network 2414413 - Disclosure - Postretirement Benefit Plans (Fair Value of Plan Assets) (Details) with the uri http://www.xyleminc.com/role/PostretirementBenefitPlansFairValueOfPlanAssetsDetails. The value of a concept broken down by its components along the DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis axis should be equal to its component pieces. An error could occur for one of the following reasons:
1. The values of the plan assets by category have been further disaggregated by additional dimensions such as geography. Plan Asset categories should not be dimensionally disaggregated and members should be defined for each security class reported. i.e. Equity Securities in the US should be represented as a single member.
2. The default value of 567,000,000 is incorrectly totaled for DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets
3. Not all dimension members or additional dimensions have been defined on the category axis DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis.
4. The filer has reported a sub component of plan assets that does not represent a complete breakdown of the total. In these cases the element DefinedBenefitPlanPlanAssetsInvestmentWithinPlanAssetCategoryAmount should be used instead of the element DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets.
This rule aggregates the value of member components located on the axis at the highest level of aggregation to avoid double counting in the event that the company uses a hierarchy of members.
The properties of this us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets fact are: Period :2018-12-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:FairValueByMeasurementBasisAxis=us-gaap:EstimateOfFairValueFairValueDisclosureMember Unit : USD

entry.message:
[DQC.US.0070.7645] The concept DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets with a defaulted value of 271,000,000 is not equal to the aggregated value of the dimensionally qualified components on the axis DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis which has an aggregate value of 148,000,000 based on the data in the filing. The aggregated value is calculated by adding the members in the network 2414403 - Disclosure - Postretirement Benefit Plans (Summary of Plan Assets, Benefit Obligation and Funded Status) (Details) with the uri http://www.xyleminc.com/role/PostretirementBenefitPlansSummaryOfPlanAssetsBenefitObligationAndFundedStatusDetails. The values of the calculation components are as follows: HedgeFundsMember --> 67,000,000 --> us-gaap:FairValueByFairValueHierarchyLevelAxis=us-gaap:FairValueMeasuredAtNetAssetValuePerShareMember, us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:HedgeFundsMember USGovernmentAgenciesDebtSecuritiesMember --> 20,000,000 --> us-gaap:FairValueByFairValueHierarchyLevelAxis=us-gaap:FairValueMeasuredAtNetAssetValuePerShareMember, us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:USGovernmentAgenciesDebtSecuritiesMember CorporateDebtSecuritiesMember --> 25,000,000 --> us-gaap:FairValueByFairValueHierarchyLevelAxis=us-gaap:FairValueMeasuredAtNetAssetValuePerShareMember, us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:CorporateDebtSecuritiesMember ExchangeTradedFundsMember --> 1,000,000 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:ExchangeTradedFundsMember, us-gaap:FairValueByFairValueHierarchyLevelAxis=us-gaap:FairValueMeasuredAtNetAssetValuePerShareMember PrivateEquityFundsMember --> 6,000,000 --> us-gaap:FairValueByFairValueHierarchyLevelAxis=us-gaap:FairValueMeasuredAtNetAssetValuePerShareMember, us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:PrivateEquityFundsMember GlobalStockFundsAndSecuritiesMember --> 29,000,000 --> us-gaap:FairValueByFairValueHierarchyLevelAxis=us-gaap:FairValueMeasuredAtNetAssetValuePerShareMember, us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=xyl:GlobalStockFundsAndSecuritiesMember
The value of a concept broken down by its components along the DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis axis should be equal to its component pieces. An error could occur for one of the following reasons:
1. The values of the plan assets by category have been further disaggregated by additional dimensions such as geography. Plan Asset categories should not be dimensionally disaggregated and members should be defined for each security class reported. i.e. Equity Securities in the US should be represented as a single member.
2. The default value of 271,000,000 is incorrectly totaled for DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets
3. Not all dimension members or additional dimensions have been defined on the category axis DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis.
4. The filer has reported a sub component of plan assets that does not represent a complete breakdown of the total. In these cases the element DefinedBenefitPlanPlanAssetsInvestmentWithinPlanAssetCategoryAmount should be used instead of the element DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets.
This rule aggregates the value of member components located on the axis at the highest level of aggregation to avoid double counting in the event that the company uses a hierarchy of members.
The properties of this us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets fact are: Period :2018-12-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:FairValueByFairValueHierarchyLevelAxis=us-gaap:FairValueMeasuredAtNetAssetValuePerShareMember Unit : USD

property.value: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Amount

entry.message:
[DQC.US.0070.7645] The concept DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets with a defaulted value of 605,000,000 is not equal to the aggregated value of the dimensionally qualified components on the axis DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis which has an aggregate value of 323,000,000 based on the data in the filing. The aggregated value is calculated by adding the members in the network 2414403 - Disclosure - Postretirement Benefit Plans (Summary of Plan Assets, Benefit Obligation and Funded Status) (Details) with the uri http://www.xyleminc.com/role/PostretirementBenefitPlansSummaryOfPlanAssetsBenefitObligationAndFundedStatusDetails. The values of the calculation components are as follows: HedgeFundsMember --> 12,000,000 --> us-gaap:FairValueByMeasurementBasisAxis=us-gaap:EstimateOfFairValueFairValueDisclosureMember, us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:HedgeFundsMember DerivativeMember --> 39,000,000 --> us-gaap:FairValueByMeasurementBasisAxis=us-gaap:EstimateOfFairValueFairValueDisclosureMember, us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:DerivativeMember InsuranceContractsAndOtherMember --> 16,000,000 --> us-gaap:FairValueByMeasurementBasisAxis=us-gaap:EstimateOfFairValueFairValueDisclosureMember, us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=xyl:InsuranceContractsAndOtherMember USGovernmentAgenciesDebtSecuritiesMember --> 62,000,000 --> us-gaap:FairValueByMeasurementBasisAxis=us-gaap:EstimateOfFairValueFairValueDisclosureMember, us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:USGovernmentAgenciesDebtSecuritiesMember CorporateDebtSecuritiesMember --> 91,000,000 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:CorporateDebtSecuritiesMember, us-gaap:FairValueByMeasurementBasisAxis=us-gaap:EstimateOfFairValueFairValueDisclosureMember ExchangeTradedFundsMember --> 0 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:ExchangeTradedFundsMember, us-gaap:FairValueByMeasurementBasisAxis=us-gaap:EstimateOfFairValueFairValueDisclosureMember PrivateEquityFundsMember --> 0 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:PrivateEquityFundsMember, us-gaap:FairValueByMeasurementBasisAxis=us-gaap:EstimateOfFairValueFairValueDisclosureMember GlobalStockFundsAndSecuritiesMember --> 103,000,000 --> us-gaap:FairValueByMeasurementBasisAxis=us-gaap:EstimateOfFairValueFairValueDisclosureMember, us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=xyl:GlobalStockFundsAndSecuritiesMember
The value of a concept broken down by its components along the DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis axis should be equal to its component pieces. An error could occur for one of the following reasons:
1. The values of the plan assets by category have been further disaggregated by additional dimensions such as geography. Plan Asset categories should not be dimensionally disaggregated and members should be defined for each security class reported. i.e. Equity Securities in the US should be represented as a single member.
2. The default value of 605,000,000 is incorrectly totaled for DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets
3. Not all dimension members or additional dimensions have been defined on the category axis DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis.
4. The filer has reported a sub component of plan assets that does not represent a complete breakdown of the total. In these cases the element DefinedBenefitPlanPlanAssetsInvestmentWithinPlanAssetCategoryAmount should be used instead of the element DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets.
This rule aggregates the value of member components located on the axis at the highest level of aggregation to avoid double counting in the event that the company uses a hierarchy of members.
The properties of this us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets fact are: Period :2019-12-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:FairValueByMeasurementBasisAxis=us-gaap:EstimateOfFairValueFairValueDisclosureMember Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:7645 Rule version: 13.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1524472/000152447220000006/xyl1231201910kv1.htm 6707

property.name: label
property.value: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Amount

entry.message:
[DQC.US.0070.7645] The concept DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets with a defaulted value of 605,000,000 is not equal to the aggregated value of the dimensionally qualified components on the axis DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis which has an aggregate value of 596,000,000 based on the data in the filing. The aggregated value is calculated by adding the members in the network 2414413 - Disclosure - Postretirement Benefit Plans (Fair Value of Plan Assets) (Details) with the uri http://www.xyleminc.com/role/PostretirementBenefitPlansFairValueOfPlanAssetsDetails. The values of the calculation components are as follows: DefinedBenefitPlanCashAndCashEquivalentsMember --> 273,000,000 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanCashAndCashEquivalentsMember, us-gaap:FairValueByMeasurementBasisAxis=us-gaap:EstimateOfFairValueFairValueDisclosureMember USGovernmentAgenciesDebtSecuritiesMember --> 62,000,000 --> us-gaap:FairValueByMeasurementBasisAxis=us-gaap:EstimateOfFairValueFairValueDisclosureMember, us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:USGovernmentAgenciesDebtSecuritiesMember HedgeFundsMember --> 12,000,000 --> us-gaap:FairValueByMeasurementBasisAxis=us-gaap:EstimateOfFairValueFairValueDisclosureMember, us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:HedgeFundsMember InsuranceContractsAndOtherMember --> 16,000,000 --> us-gaap:FairValueByMeasurementBasisAxis=us-gaap:EstimateOfFairValueFairValueDisclosureMember, us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=xyl:InsuranceContractsAndOtherMember DerivativeMember --> 39,000,000 --> us-gaap:FairValueByMeasurementBasisAxis=us-gaap:EstimateOfFairValueFairValueDisclosureMember, us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:DerivativeMember ExchangeTradedFundsMember --> 0 --> us-gaap:FairValueByMeasurementBasisAxis=us-gaap:EstimateOfFairValueFairValueDisclosureMember, us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:ExchangeTradedFundsMember GlobalStockFundsAndSecuritiesMember --> 103,000,000 --> us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=xyl:GlobalStockFundsAndSecuritiesMember, us-gaap:FairValueByMeasurementBasisAxis=us-gaap:EstimateOfFairValueFairValueDisclosureMember CorporateDebtSecuritiesMember --> 91,000,000 --> us-gaap:FairValueByMeasurementBasisAxis=us-gaap:EstimateOfFairValueFairValueDisclosureMember, us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:CorporateDebtSecuritiesMember
The value of a concept broken down by its components along the DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis axis should be equal to its component pieces. An error could occur for one of the following reasons:
1. The values of the plan assets by category have been further disaggregated by additional dimensions such as geography. Plan Asset categories should not be dimensionally disaggregated and members should be defined for each security class reported. i.e. Equity Securities in the US should be represented as a single member.
2. The default value of 605,000,000 is incorrectly totaled for DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets
3. Not all dimension members or additional dimensions have been defined on the category axis DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis.
4. The filer has reported a sub component of plan assets that does not represent a complete breakdown of the total. In these cases the element DefinedBenefitPlanPlanAssetsInvestmentWithinPlanAssetCategoryAmount should be used instead of the element DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets.
This rule aggregates the value of member components located on the axis at the highest level of aggregation to avoid double counting in the event that the company uses a hierarchy of members.
The properties of this us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets fact are: Period :2019-12-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:FairValueByMeasurementBasisAxis=us-gaap:EstimateOfFairValueFairValueDisclosureMember Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:7645 Rule version: 13.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1524472/000152447220000006/xyl1231201910kv1.htm 6707
